casebody.data:
SHOUGH, EX PARTE. In matter of Road. T. A. Hartwell

moved for a Gertiorari to remove the proceedings upon laying a road in Hunterdon county.

*265The reason upon which the. Court granted the application, was, that it does not appear on the proceedings, that notice of the meeting of the surveyors, had been served on those of them who did not attend. Four of them were absent on the first day of meeting.

Certiorari granted.
